text: <@U13TWBRBL> yes, the detail is in the deck on fab-37 — we no longer need query() bc the endorsement flow provides that ability

thanks <@U0KN2SSKE>. so to validate my understanding, to do queries via chaincode in v1.0, a client would send a proposal to one or more endorser (any peer that has the target chaincode deployed), invoke a method and get the results form the ProposalResponse.Response object. if it sends to multiple endorsers it can perform a “strong read” so it doesn’t have to explicitly trust a single peer
